title: LeagueClient.exe - Bad Image
body:
Hi! 

I am getting an error message whenever I try to open my league client; this is weird and it has never happened before. 

the error message is as follows: 
C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\libcrypto-1_1.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc0000020. 

Just for the record; I played a game of league, closed the client, then restarted my computer; since then I have been running into this error. I have attempted repairs with the Hextech Repair Tool... and tried a fresh install using it, however this is not helping. I get to the point where I am able to click on 'Launch' - but right after, I am confronted by this error message again. 

Help please!

replies.body:
whoops; sorry i did not realise that this was replied on! 

i managed to get this solved by repatching the leagueclient ... but how exactly i cannot recall. it's been a while!

Let's try taking a bit more of a manual approach to fixing this dll issue. Refer to the image below for a certain file to delete, and then try running League from the other file mentioned. Let me know how that works out.

https://i.gyazo.com/2b7a216c77c56913e6c80f0fee2019f2.png

I tried this a few days ago and it didn't work. I found another thread that said to delete the patches and wait for it to update again.  Which didn't work again. So I went back to try this a 2nd time today and it finally worked. Although now I have to wait for the game to update. Which is a pain and may have been trolled by someone but I was desperate. This is the only game I have played for the past four years and I still love it as much as when I first got it. 

Happy this finally worked for me. I didn't want to miss out on the new game mode.
